scripts.generate-certificate:
mkdir -p certificates && echo "[dn]
CN=local-tilavaraus
[req]
distinguished_name = dn
[EXT]
subjectAltName=DNS:local-tilavaraus
keyUsage=digitalSignature
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth"| openssl req -x509 -out certificates/local-tilavaraus.crt -keyout certificates/local-tilavaraus.key -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -sha256 -subj '/CN=local-tilavaraus' -extensions EXT -config /dev/stdin
